mention.text: MOSCOW -- For the first time since the overthrow of the Czar in 1917 , the Soviet Union has been seized by the collective will of the first time since the overthrow of the Czar in 1917 people In a dramatic climax to the coup in Moscow , the hard-liners who took power Monday were forced to capitulate yesterday by defiant protesters and a determined Russian Parliament that held firm against tanks and threats Boris Yeltsin , the president of the Russian republic , led that resistance from the embattled parliament building in Moscow and seemed to tower over the hard-liners during the tense standoff the unabashedly pro-Western Mr. Yeltsin now emerges as easily the most powerful man in the nation By rallying the general public and parts of the army against the eight leaders of the coup , Mr. Yeltsin showed that democratic changes ushered in by President Mikhail Gorbachev over the past six years have had an enormous -- and perhaps irreversible -- effect on the U.S.S.R. .
the first time since the overthrow of the Czar in 1917

the coup in Moscow , the hard-liners who took power Monday were forced to capitulate yesterday by defiant protesters and a determined Russian Parliament that held firm against tanks and threats Boris Yeltsin , the president of the Russian republic , led that resistance from the embattled parliament building in Moscow and seemed to tower over the hard-liners during the tense standoff
the hard-liners who took power Monday were forced to capitulate yesterday by defiant protesters

a determined Russian Parliament that held firm against tanks and threats Boris Yeltsin , the president of the Russian republic , led that resistance from the embattled parliament building in Moscow and seemed to tower over the hard-liners during the tense standoff
